Attributes.description: Critical and practical questions about how discourse communities construct and mobilize knowledge. The evaluation of knowledge as information/misinformation. How the evaluation of information is shaped by discursive contexts, rhetorical goals, and communication forms.
Attributes.prereq: Pre-reqs: One of ASTU 100, ASTU 101, WRDS 150, WRDS 350.
Attributes.date_buildings: Term: 2, Days: Tue Thu, Start Time: 14:00, End Time: 15:30, Building: Mathematics, Room: 204
